# Learning assessment

This is code for the learning assessment at P8105.It creates `la_df` and hen plots a histogram.

Note: Hotkey to start a code chunk is Option + command + i (on Mac)

```{r, la_chunk}

la_df = 
  tibble(
      norm_samp = rnorm(n = 500, mean = 1),
      samp_g0 = norm_samp > 0,
      abs_v_samp = abs(norm_samp)
  )

ggplot(la_df, aes(x = abs_v_samp)) +
  geom_histogram()

```
